sys_openapi_operation.name: Resize Disk
sys_openapi_operation.serialized_operation:
{"fName":"Resize Disk","fOperationId":"resizeDisk","fDescription":"Resizes a Disk you have permission to `read_write`.
The Linode this Disk is attached to must be shut down for resizing to take effect.
If you are resizing the Disk to a smaller size, it cannot be made smaller than what is required by the total size of the files current on the Disk. The Disk must not be in use. If the Disk is in use, the request will succeed but the resize will ultimately fail.
","fPath":"/linode/instances/{linodeId}/disks/{diskId}/resize","fHttpMethod":"POST","fDeprecated":false,"fRequest":{"fDescription":"The new size of the Disk.","fRequired":true,"fContents":[{"fMediaType":"application/json","fSchema":{"fName":"requestapplicationjson8454352982","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":["password"],"fEnum":[],"fProperties":[{"fName":"size","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fMinimum":1,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"integer","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fDescription":"The desired size, in MB, of the disk.
","fFormat":"int32","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"integer"}],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"object"}}]},"fResponses":[{"fStatusCode":"200","fDescription":"Resize
